ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 264
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I tried the following inferno shock ... no go also tried it with gizmo #4 no go :( Winkin Mixalot Noble House The Rathe Server Gnome Enchanter of the
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I tried the following

inferno shock
> metal twine
> metal rod
> gizmo # 6
> amber
> gears
> large lantern
> Metal Bitz
no go
also tried it with gizmo #4 no go :(


Winkin Mixalot "Noble House"
The Rathe Server
Gnome Enchanter of the highest circle
Tinker, Jewelry Craft.

On Sun, 23 Apr 2000, Rala AmaranthineFuhrer wrote:

> well I tried:
> inferno shock
> metal twine
> metal rod
> gizmo # 6
> amber
> gears
> large lantern
> Gnomish bolts
>
> thats a no go also replaced gizmo 6 with 4 for a no go
> and sproket 6 for a no go.
> so I say it isnt gnomish bolts. but I dont know what
> metal bits are or how to make them so i will have to
> wait till more people are online so I can ask
>
>
> Rala AmarantineFuhrer The UndyingTyrant
>
>
>
> > [Wed Apr 19 20:11:58 2000] Calador tells the group,
> > 'wiz spell,
> > inferno shock'
> > [Wed Apr 19 20:12:07 2000] Calador tells the group,
> > 'metal twine'
> > [Wed Apr 19 20:12:11 2000] Calador tells the group,

> > [Wed Apr 19 20:12:22 2000] Calador tells the group,

> > 'should have' used
> > gizmo #4 to keep the item from being dangerous.
> > Plus, I think Ursoo
> > was refering to metal bits, not metal parts.. but I
> > dont know for
> > sure, since Dark Elves don't meddle much into
> > tinkering.
> >
